entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Programmatically switching from left to right/right to left localization. #14755
  • Cursor Position set to beginning of Entry #14752
  • XmlSerializer iOS #14751
  • Crashing on Startup in Release on Physical Devices #14750
  • StackLayout HorizontalOptions & VerticalOptions do nothing. #14749
  • Evaluate stepper increment defaults for consistency and accessibility #14748
  • Setting CollectionView.ItemSizingStrategy to MeasureFirstItem causes StackLayout to not respond to content having IsVisible set to false #14746
  • MeasureOverride will be load many times #14745
  • [Android]Key pressed event not works in entry using handler #14744
  • Running all tests in Controls.DeviceTests on Windows fails with access violation #14742
    Backlog
  • [Bug] OnChildMeasureInvalidated Method is not triggered at runtime. #14741
    Backlog
  • ScrollView with VerticalStackLayout and dynamically added child controls incorrectly renders on Android platform (iOS OK). #14737
  • Use of Preferences class in .Net MAUI class library causes build failure with NU1202 error #14733
  • MAUI Blazor Project Publish Bug #14732
  • Can't center CollectionView within a VerticalLayout or StackLayout on iOS #14731
    Backlog

Closed

  • Safari browser development tools does not work for Blazor Hybrid 16.4 IOS/Mac Catalyst App #14736
  • Windows WebView2 ScriptDialogOpening CoreWebView2ScriptDialogOpeningEventArgsIt not functional #14717
  • [Bug] ICommandMapper and IPropertyMapper usage is very inconsistent #2204
    Backlog
  • Deployment of first tutorial failed #14743
  • DEP0700: Registration of the app failed. [0x80080204] error 0xC00CE014: App manifest validation error: The app manifest must be valid as per schema #14564
  • [Bug] OnChildMeasureInvalidated Method is not triggered at runtime. #3044
    Backlog
  • Initially selected item in CollectionView isn't highlighted on iOS #14730
  • Resizetizer rotates large images #6426
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor cannot switch Chinese input language #14593

PullRequests

Created

  • Call the correct Disconnect method from DisconnectHandler #14757
    backport/suggested
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update net6.0 version #14754
  • Improve some test methods #14753
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • [release/6.0.5xx-sr11] Update version branding #14747

Updated

  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Don't measure text spans if type is HTML #14705
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • Correctly re-apply font formatting to HTML text #14701
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
